title: Out with the old, in with the new! Res Lease in Austin. 4 Beds, 2 Baths
posting_body: You can't miss this fantastic opportunity!
This superb 1 story 4 bedroom 2 bathroom home in the Westgate neighborhood, just minutes from downtown is waiting for you!
This house welcomes you to its spacious living room with skylights on the vaulted ceiling, and a floor-to-ceiling brick fireplace.

The well-designed kitchen boasts a great U-layout, has plenty of storage in its pantry and an abundance of white cabinets, plus comes fully equipped with stainless appliances: electric range, dishwasher and refrigerator.
There is a wonderful family/ bonus room that comes complete with built-in shelves.
This can easily be used as a home office!
The primary bedroom has a ceiling-fan, walk-in closet, a fully renovated bathroom with single vanity, huge mirror and a tiled walk-in shower great for relaxing after a long day!
The additional bedrooms share a newly renovated bathroom with a shower/tub combo.
Don't forget to check out the amazing backyard surrounded by trees, with a covered terrace ready to be enjoyed with your loved ones!
Tour and apply to this one before it’s gone!
